ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos Faction for DE Necros
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hmm this is a dangerous thing.  altough most people in qeynos like me ie they con positively including the guards.  I have camped next to a guard and when
ygData.messageBody:
> -Grizumpy, 17th lvl DE Necro, now bound right next to a Qeynos Guard.


hmm this is a dangerous thing. altough most people in qeynos like me ie
they con positively including the guards. I have camped next to a guard and
when I reentered the game he killed me. I would be careful about being
bound that close..... I even checked him after I died and he conned
positively. Could be a bug. <shrug> For what it is worth.

Aarkon on Povar. 11th level necromancer.
